page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: { A BRANSFORD SCHOOL PUPIL'S DAY It is Monday and Dad gets up at 6 a.m. When he goes to work at 6.45 Mum gets up and at 7.00 she wakes my three sisters and me. We have break- fast at 7.15, usually cereals or toast, then watch T.V. until 7.45. At 8.00 one sister catches the school 'bus to Malvern and at 8.45 Mum takes the rest of us to school at Bransford then she goes to work herself at Leigh Court. She starts work at 9.00 and she is a cleaner. My dad is a coalman and he delivers coal as far as Worcester. We take sandwiches for lunch at school. Mum picks us up from school at 3.45 and we have a cooked meal before we go to Youth Club at 7.00 p.m. At 7.15 Dad goes to crib at the 'Cross Keys' at Suckley. Mum picks us up at 9.00 and we go home and have a snack before we go to bed.
